data.text: @AmeshiaCross How your people say it, “ bless her heart”.
@AmeshiaCross There other alternative to this Vaccine and that what you should be saying to her. If she choose not to take it that what friends do. Who not been program about this Vaccine.

told her pregnancy wasn't likely 3 years ago. It's sad for her all the way around but her reproductive issues have 0 to do with the vaccine she refuses to get. She has 4 degrees and still somehow got wrapped up in conspiracy theory nonsense 🙄
